description: Furnish the following information in respect of each of the FABRICS mentioned above. Add up to 3

dataTableData.description: Furnish the following information in respect of each of the FABRICS mentioned above. Add up to 3

tooltip: Enter Description of goods Eg textiles
Enter Hawker licence Number Eg BW0000123456
Select corresponding Tarrif Heading (Hs code) Eg 1111111

description: Enter Quantity of Goods to be imported
tooltip: Enter Quantity of Goods to be imported eg 23

description: Select Quanity units of goods to be imported
tooltip: Select Quantity units of goods to be imported Eg tonnes/kg/litres
Select Port of entry Eg Pioneer Border Post

description: Required if you have previously been issued with a permit

I have satisfied myself that the preparation of the application has been done in conformity with the guidelines and requirements in respect of the above-mentioned export permit provisions, with which I have fully acquainted myself and to which I unconditionally agree to

I accept that the decision by BOTC will be final and conclusive and that the Ministry or Botswana Unified Revenue Service (BURS)  may at any time conduct or order an investigation to verify information furnished in the application form
The information furnished in this application is true and correct

The applicant or any one of its associates, or related party is not subject of an investigation by the Police, the Directorate on Corruption Economic Crime, or the Commissioner for Botswana Unified Revenue Services (BURS) into previous claims or other related matters.
